channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC PCS 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC PCS 7

item.title: CVE-2020-10048|2024-08-04T10:50:57.903Z -- siemens -- simatic%20pcs%207
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC PCS 7 (All versions), SIMATIC WinCC (All versions < V7.5 SP2). Due to an insecure password verification process, an attacker could bypass the password protection set on protected files, thus being granted access to the protected content, circumventing authentication.
